attributes.action: stop using tax payers money to support MP's wages, Farming subs, imigrants, dole and benifits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the tax payer cannot support all those who are not working or take from us in the form of wages people on benifits should have a cheque book issued by the Government so they can buy food and clothes from state set up shops and stop the spending in the pubs and smoking we should not have to fund this how long can we fund before it all runs out and there is a melt down of our once rich commerce etc we need more money spent on education in the real world to create job opportunities
